entry.title: [CW] The FBI just [raided Mar A Lago](https://www.cnn.com/2022/08/08/politics/mar-a-l
entry.content:
The FBI just [raided Mar A Lago](https://www.cnn.com/2022/08/08/politics/mar-a-lago-search-warrant-fbi-donald-trump/index.html) (Trump's home).
This doesn't seem quite *unbelievably* stupid, since, there is a lot of very stupid things that have already happened, so I can believe it, but...man this just seems like a really dumb thing to do.
There's no way this isn't a major step on an escalatory spiral. What will the Republicans do to Biden when they regain power?
